part_type_life: This is the function that governs how long each individual particle of the indicated type remains on the screen. As with other particle functions, you provide a minimum and a maximum value (in steps)and each particle lifespan will be a random number of steps from within the specified range. To have all particles with the same lifetime, set the two values to be the same.
